title: Trinity Force on Kalista?
body: I think it has some potential. Haven't got much of a sample pool yet. Played her once outside of play-testing builds in custom games but Triforce did the trick for me.

replies.body:
It could be good but a lot of the value Tri Force is the Phage/Sheen procs, and from my knowledge i don't believe the Phage proc helps her passive (reason being her passive scales with **Enhanced Movement** and not actual move speed), and the sheen Proc is mediocre because she isn't really a caster ADC in that sense.

It probably can work but there are probably better items.
You can get Sheen to proc fairly regularly with Q and E alone. You probably proc it as often as Ezreal with a standard Triforce AD Carry build.

The major difference is that Ezreal can get procs off consistently from a long range (Q) whereas Kalista lacks that ability, and it's probably better to get something with stats more suited to what you want.

Generally Triforce buys you will see that the champions get massive benefits out of the parts that are bought.

Kalista lacks benefits from anything but the Zeal to decent effect, and would be better just buying a different item for the damage.

She benefits from Phage and Zeal Stats + Passives and a good Kalista can proc Sheen regularly between Q and E. It all depends on what you're building alongside the Triforce. Back when Spirit Visage granted 20% CDR I was getting it as a defensive item on all of my AD Carries.

If that's how your playing then it's a matter of preference over a matter of whats best.

Fact is Phage passive is wasted, and that means that the Phage is pretty %%%% as an item for her (phage is gold inefficent if the passive is wasted.), Sheen is also Meh cause yes you *can* proc it, but it tends to be wasted over something that actually just increases your normal AD (and if your procing it just for the sheen proc then the AD scaling is probably better)

Zeal is honestly the only item she scales decently with, and it's probably better to go into a different item line.
Does it synergise with her passive? (being the bonus phage movespeed) I always test Trinity Force on any AD Champion really, whether it be Yasuo or anyone at all. I think it could work.
I'd use it but my games with Kal always finish before I get enough money to build it...
